Reviews.Title: “Stylish, convenient, clean, very helpful staff and comfortable beds”
Reviews.Author: Tallai
Reviews.Content: cancel 3 nights due illness staff understanding didnt charge value money compared hotels paris convenient galleries music shops close comfortable amenities love return flash trip paris

Reviews.Title: “Next time it's straight to the New Orient!”

Reviews.Content: 6 nights paris decided spend 3 left bank 3 chose hotel bank stint based consistently reviews sites 3 left bank nights expensive 3star hotel fabulous location close seine islands latin quarter etc grew attached reluctant leave days walked orient wishing stayed six nights compared hotel orient 25 euros cheaper night money lovely nearly twice size spacious bath balconies bed fluffier pillows doubleglazed windows quieter ac bad air conditioner previous hotel acte ruin trip hot spell orient staff hosts incredibly attentive friendly nicely appointed clean private public spaces extremely welcoming expected downside compared hotel supposed distance riverside left bank attractions surprise delight location upper 8th downside tidy peaceful city quiet street nearby brasseries boulangeries shops cafes service locals catering tourists it’s easily walking distance montmartre louvre tulleries gardens etc nearby metrorer stops getting snap return paris straight orient enthusiastically recommend family friends colleagues

Reviews.Content: orient hotel perfect trip paris time europe matter expect establishment staying nights evidenced positive feedback provided perfect location hotel close proximity metro villiers station surrounding restaurants groceryconvenience store street bakeries galore fitted laundrette street couple stores perfect stay mention friendly staff help partner stay paris unable speak french wasnt language barrier communicate english stayed superior twin double booked budget bookings minute micheline able speak owners happy offer superior twin price double nights arranged beds joined arrival train ride amsterdam glad accomodation door own little bit paris honestly surprised size fitout cleanliness dont star rating paris expect star hotel accomodation personally stars maybe service arent provided star youre paris service forever wont ill leave yourselves paris ill definitely staying orient hotel ill recommending friends

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel; charming and well located”

Reviews.Content: orient hotel situated neighborhood traditionally music instrument makers reside hotel violin makers dealers repair shops etc neighborhood ideally located st lazare station surprisingly close opera house grands boulevards famous department stores champs elysées hotel recently renovated quiet air conditioning expects star paris hotels rates reasonable atmosphere hotel agreeable

Reviews.Title: “Perfect boutique French hotel in Paris - highly reco”
Reviews.Author: mlaw423
Reviews.Content: loved orient hotel recommend looking boutique hotel paris 3 min walk villiers europe metro stations 8th arr 7 min walk gare st lazare checked 11pm front desk guy super nice helpful stayed 13 3rd floor balcony remodeled bathroom pics nice clean perfect wife ive stayed westerns paris block orient price orient choice summer time wifi excellent quality breakfast nice free service friendly quiet neighborhood night guests businessmen tourist couples definitely stay time im paris

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding value in a warm and charming setting.”
Reviews.Author: RAvanti
Reviews.Content: true hotel de charme thoughtful service impeccable reasonable pricing hotel orient conveniently located staffed exceptionally pleasant helpful people feel immediately home free wifi welcome bonus stayed occasions exceptionally pleasant experience

Reviews.Title: “Great!”
Reviews.Author: jldut
Reviews.Content: loved hotel expected europe road supermarket 5 minute walk metro station staff friendly sometimes cant expect france friendly breakfasts nice ones travelling free internet plus

Reviews.Title: “Another wonderful time in Paris”
Reviews.Author: ForeignFun
Reviews.Content: stayed orient found welcoming atmosphere charming decor typically parisian lovely boutique hotel attractively furnished bathshower quality fittings location stores nearby opposite direction market stalls local shops street eg le notre bakers cakes fishmonger wonderful seafood display cheese oil shop etc disappointment couldnt earlier booked

Reviews.Title: “New Orient is Wonderful!”
Reviews.Author: proteons
Reviews.Content: highly recommend orient hotel stayed balcony looking street flower box railing bathroom clean bed firm clean ceiling free wifi didnt bring laptop computer free lobby market street convenient boulangerie 12 block serves delicious pastries raisin croissants metro close staff hotel friendly helpful definitely return trip paris merci orient

Reviews.Title: “Excellent accomodations”

Reviews.Content: wonderful experience orient hotel boyfriend traveling speak french staff hotel helpful translation directions hotel provides value price definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel at a budget price!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: ErnieG2007
Reviews.Content: wife scheduled hotel reading negative reviews trip advisor decided cancel reservation noticed hotel ad website reading reviews decided book 7 days dont regret booking hotel simply perfect perfect location close st lazare train station couldnt hear trains coming heading metro station 5 min walk hotel friendly staff clean hotel smelled nice smell corner getting hotel luggage walk price breakfast 7 euros person cheaper eating breakfast hotel simply stands hotels door hotel wasnt day checkout noticed definitely hotel stay trip paris

Reviews.Title: “Will return”
